DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy tolerance food supplement B-Back® , contain α-casozepine , taurine , eleutherococcus senticosus Extramel® , burnout syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Tolerance B-Back® Burnout Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The burnout syndrome currently concern professional category . In 2010 WHO estimate three country important work-related depression Unites States , Ukraine France . The direct indirect cost work-related stress insurance program insignificant . The purpose study determine efficacy food supplement B-Back® propose order improve symptom burnout syndrome : stress , fatigue , emotional imbalance , anxiety , sleep , etc . The main objective determine efficacy B-Back® symptom suggestive burnout syndrome use Burnout Measure Short version ( BMS-10 ) . The others objectives evaluate tolerance product , evaluate efficacy B-Back® symptom suggestive burnout syndrome use Maslach Burnout Inventory , depression , global quality professional family life , sleep , fatigue ( energy ) .
